title: T Rowe Price Equity Income Fund Enters Meta Position in 2nd Quarter
text: T Rowe Price Equity Income Fund (Trades, Portfolio), part of Baltimore-based T. Rowe Price Group Inc. ( TROW , Financial), disclosed that its top five trades during the second quarter included a new position in Meta Platforms Inc. ( META , Financial), a boost to its holding in News Corp. ( NWSA , Financial), the closure of its stake in UnitedHealth Group Inc. ( UNH , Financial) and reductions to its positions in MetLife Inc. ( MET , Financial) and Elevance Health Inc. ( ELV , Financial).

title: Recession Fears Weigh Down Tech Stocks AMZN, AAPL, MSFT, META
text: Tech stocks, long a gauge for the health of the market, are in focus this week with Silicon Valley up at the earnings confessional. Heading into earnings from the likes of Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG , NASDAQ: GOOGL ), Meta Platforms (NASDAQ: META ), Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL ) and more, investors will be looking for signs the country isn't destined for a recession.

title: Meta Platforms: Poster Child For Job Cuts
text: Meta Platforms might start laying off employees to contain some out of control costs. The social media giant stared 2022 with Reality Labs losses running at an unsustainable $12 billion annual clip.

title: Why Meta Platforms Stock Keeps Falling
text: This story starts with Snap -- but doesn't end there.

title: It's Nervous Time As Meta Platforms Prepares To Report Earnings
text: The Meta earnings report arrives late Wednesday and should provide an inside look at the state of online advertising. The post It's Nervous Time As Meta Platforms Prepares To Report Earnings appeared first on Investor's Business Daily.

title: Meta Quest 2 will be $100 more expensive August 1
text: Welcome to the new price of VR.

title: Meta has been hit with 2 new lawsuits that say Instagram spurs eating disorders in teenage users
text: One lawsuit against Instagram's owner said that the company created a "perfect storm" of addiction and exposure to harmful content for teenage users.

title: Meta raises prices on Quest 2 headsets by $100, starting Aug. 1
text: Facebook parent company Meta Platforms Inc. META, -3.70% on Tuesday said it is raising the price of Meta Quest 2 headsets by $100 to $399.99 (128GB) and $499.99 (256GB), starting Aug. 1. The company reports second-quarter results on Wednesday.

title: Meta Platforms' (META) Declining Global MAU to Hurt Q2 Earnings
text: Meta Platforms' (META) Q2 results are likely to reflect the negative impacts of Instagram's ban in Russia and the continued slowdown in company's online commerce vertical.

title: As Zuckerberg bets on TikTok-style videos, Meta heads for first-ever revenue drop
text: Meta's future may lie in the metaverse, but when the company reports results on Wednesday, investors will be focused on two more immediate bets: pumping up short-video offering Reels to compete with TikTok and rebuilding its ads system after Apple throttled access to user data.

title: Facebook parent Meta raises price of its Quest 2 VR headset by $100
text: Meta is asking consumers to pay more for its headsets as the company pushes its business towards the metaverse.

title: How U.S. gun manufacturers market their firearms despite restrictions
How Mark Zuckerberg Is Leading Meta Into Its Next Phase
text: Facebook's founder is setting a relentless pace as he pushes his company through a tech transformation during a global economic slowdown.

title: 3 Big Tech Stocks Reporting Today - All Expected to Grow This Quarter
text: The big technology stocks are cash cows and continue to deliver despite the continually deteriorating operating climate and the rate overhang.

title: You can change your Instagram feed so it looks less like TikTok and only shows posts from your friends. Here's how
text: Instagram is mimicking TikTok with feed changes. To avoid content from accounts you don't want to see, you can streamline your feed to show accounts you choose.

title: A newly discovered malware hijacks Facebook Business accounts
text: An ongoing cybercriminal operation is targeting digital marketing and human resources professionals in an effort to hijack Facebook Business accounts using a newly discovered data-stealing malware.

title: Instagram CEO admits test pivot to video is 'not yet good' as users criticize changes
text: Instagram CEO Adam Mosseri shared a video on Twitter Tuesday explaining recent changes to the social media platform.

title: Facebook employees are preparing for staff cuts of up to 10%
text: The biggest story in tech right now is that Facebook employees are preparing for layoffs — with some predicting cuts of up to 10%.
